node.text:
No matter what your idea of the perfect day out is, the host of amenities lined up for you at The Raviz Kovalam will surely surpass it! Add to this a Catamaran Tour, Speedboat cruise or Backwater Cruise & Village Tour on a country boat to turn your outing into a winner!

For bookings contact: +91 471 305 1234 | 1800 4252 2220 
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com, reservations@theraviz.com
